item.title: Orga Care Anti Dandruff Hair Mist
item.dc:creator: wijdanmalik
item.description:
• Orga Care hair mist causes scalp nourishment.
  • It reduces dandruff.
  • It make your hair thick.
  • It keeps hair moisturized.
  • It causes clog pores open.
item.content:encoded:
Orga Care Anti Dandruff Hair Mist

 

  • Orga Care hair mist helps easily detangle your hair and boost growth.
  • It helps easily fight dandruff, and restores lost moisture.
  • It contains Hyaluronic acid which is known for its excellent moisturizing qualities.
  • Orga Care Anti dandruff Hair Serum helps fight dandruff causing fungus by working directly on your scalp.
  • This is a water based spray that keeps your hair oil-free and helps keep your scalp clean.

item.title: Orga Care Hair Keratin Shampoo
item.dc:creator: wijdanmalik
item.description:
• Orga Care Shampoo gives hydration and shine to hairs.
  • It Causes Glossier and smoother hairs.
  • It will bring moisturizer and elasticity to hairs.
  • It reduces frizz and gives straightening look.
item.content:encoded:
Orga Care Hair Keratin Shampoo

 

  • Smoother, sleeker hair: If you imagine a damaged hair shaft to look like shingles on a roof that are all lifted, Orga Care shampoo will help lay the shingles down flat so the hair looks glossier and smoother.
  • Thicker, stronger strands: “If the hair starts to look dull, adding keratin shampoo into your routine will bring back moisture, hydration, shine, and elasticity.
  • Less frizz: “It will smooth the cuticle layer, which reduces frizz and gives your hair a healthier appearance.

item.title: Orga Care Hair Growth Serum
item.dc:creator: wijdanmalik
item.description:
• Orga Care Strengthens Hair.
  • Controls Frizz.
  • Orga Care hair serum Adds Shine.
  • Orga Care hair serum Protects From Heat.
  • Orga Care hair serum protects Color Fading.
  • It Moisturizes hair.
  • Increases Elasticity.
item.content:encoded:
Orga Care Hair Growth Serum

 

  • It contains rendensyl which promotes healthy growth of hairs by prolonging the anagen phase.
  • It shortens the telogen phase, which results in a significant decrease in hair loss.
  • It serves as an high energy source for hair cells while also protecting them from solar damage and pollution, allowing them to heal naturally.
  • The effect of procapil containins hair serum helps clear blocked follicles. This unblocking activates these dormant hair follicles and provides adequate nourishment to these follicles, thus enabling large hair regrowth.

item.title: Orga Care Hair Growth Oil
item.dc:creator: wijdanmalik
item.description:
• Orga care hair oil help in hair growth.
  • Improves health of hairs and scalp.
  • Contains necessary vitamins and minerals.
  • Helps in hair strengthen and development of new hairs.
  • Improves in circulation of blood in roots.
item.content:encoded:
Orga Care Hair Growth Oil

 

  • It helps in hair loss and improve the health of hair and scalp.
  • The benefits of Orga Care hair oil is it contains necessary vitamins, minerals, and strong antioxidants help to delay the onset of hair aging.
  • This mystical potion’s content prevents split ends from forming, which lowers hair breakage. Additionally, it helps to strengthen hair follicles and promotes strong hair development.
  • It assure thicker hair development by feeding your scalp and enhancing blood circulation.
  • Before shampooing, Orga Care hair oil treat as an agent. It prevents dryness and regulates frizz.
    The benefits of Orga Care oil is hair development are numerous and include enhancing the activity of specific enzymes that cooperate to stop hair loss.
